Project Dependency Graph

Dependency Tree

  • com.github.jmkgreen.morphia:morphia-validation:jar:1.2.3-SNAPSHOT
    JSR303 Validation

    Description: Morphia is an Object-Document Mapper, written in Java for MongoDB. Application developer authoring code in Java and using the mongo-java-driver can use Morphia to map POJO classes into MongoDB documents and vice-versa. Morphia provides a Datastore, Query, and DAO-style interfaces including CRUD services in a type-safe manner.

    URL: http://github.com/jmkgreen/morphia/morphia-validation/

    Project License: The Apache Software License, Version 2.0
